The grading scale for this exam is:

  • 44 or better: some sort of A
  • 34 or better: some sort of B
  • 23 or better: some sort of C
  • 19 or better: some sort of D

Overall course grades will include plus/minus grades such as B- or B+ as well as just a B. On the above scale, these finer cutoffs roughly divide each full grade range into thirds.

Important Note: While your exam was hand-graded by highly skilled TAs, this system of returning exams electronically is new and includes autorecording of individual problem scores. Please check to make sure that your total score, listed above, matches the sum of your scores on the following pages!
